Subscriptions Collection

Lists all Subscriptions.

List all Subscriptions

GET - https://api.zype.com/subscriptions/?page=page&per_page=per_page

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
page The page number of records to return (zero indexed). Example: 0. Number
per_page The number of records to return. Example: 10. Number

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
  "response": [
  {
    {
      "_id": "54579a714c616e0389010000",
      "_keywords": [
        "com",
        "example",
        "subscription",
        "test123"
      ],
      "amount": "5.99",
      "consumer_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
      "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z",
      "currency": "USD",
      "deleted": false,
      "interval": "month",
      "plan_id": "544813e74c616e0dc0000000",
      "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
      "stripe_card_token": "tok_14umRWBZRS312G8xjfXD1zHQvP3",
      "stripe_id": "sub_54wKXHYIaIj8812YgK",
      "trial_period_days": 14,
      "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z"
    }
  }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    current: 2,
    previous: 1,
    next: 3,
    per_page: 10,
    pages: 1
  }
}

Create a Subscription

POST - https://api.zype.com/subscriptions/{subscription}

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
subscription A set of key value pairs that describe the Subscription. Needs to include consumer_id and plan_id. Hash
consumer_id The id of the consumer to be subscribed String
plan_id The id of the plan the consumer is subscribing to String

Response

201 Content-Type: application/json

{
  "response": {
    {
      "_id": "54579a714c616e0389010000",
      "_keywords": [
        "com",
        "example",
        "subscription",
        "test123"
      ],
      "amount": "5.99",
      "consumer_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
      "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z",
      "currency": "USD",
      "deleted": false,
      "interval": "month",
      "plan_id": "544813e74c616e0dc0000000",
      "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
      "stripe_card_token": "tok_14umRWBZRS312G8xjfXD1zHQvP3",
      "stripe_id": "sub_54wKXHYIaIj8812YgK",
      "trial_period_days": 14,
      "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z"
    }
  }
}

Subscription

Lists descriptive information about a Subscription

Retrieve a Subscription

GET - https://api.zype.com/subscriptions/{id}

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
id String id of the Subscription to retrieve. Example: 5389352e69702d401b000000. String

Request

Content-Type: application/json

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
  "response": {
    {
      "_id": "54579a714c616e0389010000",
      "_keywords": [
        "com",
        "example",
        "subscription",
        "test123"
      ],
      "amount": "5.99",
      "consumer_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
      "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z",
      "currency": "USD",
      "deleted": false,
      "interval": "month",
      "plan_id": "544813e74c616e0dc0000000",
      "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
      "stripe_card_token": "tok_14umRWBZRS312G8xjfXD1zHQvP3",
      "stripe_id": "sub_54wKXHYIaIj8812YgK",
      "trial_period_days": 14,
      "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z"
    }
  }
}

Update a Subscription

PUT - https://api.zype.com/subscriptions/{id}

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
Subscription A set of key value pairs that describe the subscription. Hash
consumer_id The id of the consumer String
plan_id The id of the plan String

Request

Content-Type: application/json

Response

201 Content-Type: application/json

{
  "response": {
    {
      "_id": "54579a714c616e0389010000",
      "_keywords": [
        "com",
        "example",
        "subscription",
        "test123"
      ],
      "amount": "5.99",
      "consumer_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
      "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z",
      "currency": "USD",
      "deleted": false,
      "interval": "month",
      "plan_id": "544813e74c616e0dc0000000",
      "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
      "stripe_card_token": "tok_14umRWBZRS312G8xjfXD1zHQvP3",
      "stripe_id": "sub_54wKXHYIaIj8812YgK",
      "trial_period_days": 14,
      "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z"
    }
  }
}

Remove a Subscription

DELETE - https://api.zype.com/subscriptions/{id}

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
id String id of the Subscription to remove. Example: 5389352e69702d401b000000. String

Request

Content-Type: application/json

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
  "response": {
    {
      "_id": "54579a714c616e0389010000",
      "_keywords": [
        "com",
        "example",
        "subscription",
        "test123"
      ],
      "amount": "5.99",
      "consumer_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
      "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z",
      "currency": "USD",
      "deleted": false,
      "interval": "month",
      "plan_id": "544813e74c616e0dc0000000",
      "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
      "stripe_card_token": "tok_14umRWBZRS312G8xjfXD1zHQvP3",
      "stripe_id": "sub_54wKXHYIaIj8812YgK",
      "trial_period_days": 14,
      "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:33.668Z"
    }
  }
}
